name: BEAT TRIP
description:
BeatTrip

In BeatTrip your actions are pre-recorded on the next beat of the music
in your 8 step beat bar.

Shoot, Dash, Jump, Dive or Pickup is your arsenal, the level is your foe.
But as any cassette tape owner would know, you can record over your previous track!
Input any actions on the beat before, to replace the current actions in the bar.
